solution_line_template: There are a total of {num_rows_red} rows of red notes * {notes_per_row_red} notes per row = <<{num_rows_red}*{notes_per_row_red}={total_red_notes}>>{total_red_notes} red notes on the board.
There are {blue_per_red} blue notes per red notes * {total_red_notes} red notes = {blue_under_red} blue notes under the red notes.
With the other blue notes at the bottom of the board, there are a total of {blue_under_red} + {scattered_blue} = <<{blue_under_red}+{scattered_blue}={total_blue_notes}>>{total_blue_notes} blue notes.
So in total, there are {total_red_notes} red notes + {total_blue_notes} blue notes = <<{total_red_notes}+{total_blue_notes}={total_notes}>>{total_notes} notes in total.
